top_comments.comment: For some reason I was disappointed with the open beta. I couldn't kill anybody. Im a massive bf fan and usually I do pretty decent. But I hope I'll like the full game.
I would love to have gyro aiming in this.

This game had a such great marking till portal, after they went quiet and the beta came it was just a mess of dissapointing things. Specialist feels like they don't belong to this game, I would buy this game when it gets cheaper, I'm not gonna buy this game only for portal so that says something.
Played the beta and honestly COD is ahead with gameplay mechanics, movement and shooting. Not that COD is the best but for me better than battlefield.
can i have a free PS5 ??

comments_since_last_sample.body: BF BC 1-2, BF 3, BF 4, BF 1. I will never forget this era of Battlefield. Thank you for the great memories but I do not feel like 2042 is part of the same family. Well see at launch.
These massively open maps are not going to get me to drop BF4.
Will not be buying ea is once again pandering to the woke crowd by demanding there be a non binary character called Sundance seriously ea everybody hates this woke garbage
